page.title: 02Six Bells Abertillery.
page.content: {An account written by Claire Evans. My nan has lived here for fifty nine years.There has been many changes,such as Coronation Cottages being pulled down,levelled out,seeded and made into a playingfield which is opposite my house.Above that is the lower part of the rugby field where there used to be houses called Gilfach Cottages. There was an infants' school on the mountain called Six Bells Infants and there was a school at the bottom of the Cemetery Road which is now a warehouse.There has also been two chapels closed in recent years. The shopping area has changed very much.The undertaker's parlour, Flock's sweet shop,Tossels' cobblers and the cafe have all closed.Many other shops have also closed.The Vivian colliery has also closed down.
